messages.messageBody:
Thanks you! Someone on another list I'm on made the request for info. I'll let her know of the tentative dates and to wait on confirmation.

Hope we can make it!!

Aileen

Aileen, I hope to sign the contract next Friday. TENTATIVELY, it's the
weekend of August 22-24, if you'd like to go ahead and make some plans. I'll
post when it's firm.

Looking forward to meeting you!

~Kelly

kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> , I hope to sign the contract next Friday. TENTATIVELY, it's the
> weekend of August 22-24,

Oh, I won't be able to come. We have a time share at Myrtle Beach and that
is our week. 10 year anniversary is on 21 August so we thought it would be
nice to spend it at the beach. But I will tell everyone here about it when
you do get it finalized.
Pam G.

messages.msgSnippet: Kelly, YaHoo! Ds and I are really looking forward to see you all again this year. Thanks for doing it again. Barb E The function of the child is to live his
messages.messageBody:
Kelly,
YaHoo! Ds and I are really looking forward to see you all again this
year. Thanks for doing it again.


Barb E
"The function of the child is to live his own life - not the life that his
anxious parents think he should live."
A S Neill

Aileen
----- Original Message -----
From: Kendra
To: AlwaysLearning
Sent: Thursday, January 23, 2003 10:38 PM
Subject: [AlwaysLearning] Open Homeschool Chat





Join us for an Open Homeschool Chat - Every Friday

9-11 am (Eastern Time), 8-10 am (Central Time) --- NOTE Time Differences!!


Two ways to join the chat:

1. Javascript version is http://chat.daforest.org/
a. Click on "Advanced"
b. Choose server name -- Pegasus.mythnet.net -- from the drop-down
menu box
c. Choose channel name -- #Homeschool -- from the drop-down menu box
d. Type in your own unique nickname

Or

2. Using mIRC:
a. Open the Options box/Connect.
b. Choose the add button. Description -- MythNet
c. IRC server -- pegasus.mythnet.net -- and then click on Add. It
should now be in the drop down list to chose it.
d. Channel name -- #Homeschool. To get there, type /join
#Homeschool into the text box at the bottom of the status window and hit
enter. You will be taken to the homeschool chat room.


If you have any questions, feel free to e-mail Karen or Kendra:

Karen (Colleen)
wdkmg@...

Kendra (Gaia)
sweety9@...
---

Checked by AVG anti-virus system (http://www.grisoft.com).
